Text: How do I change it to english?

language change in steam_rld.ini   
root Binaries/win32


###
### Select your language here if available
###

Language=english


change it from russian to english
Asks for new disk to be inserted during install containing data3.bin, the torrent only contains data0.bin and data2.bin, any help?
if instalator asking for "data3.bin" just rename "data0.bin" to "data3.bin". it works for me

Azaq!!! Your torrents are fucking awesome...with that said, this one is only in Russian for me (and others it seems). I'm no wizard at figuring these things out (your stuff usually works with little need for intellect). I don't see any options for a language change and the uploading package is in crazy characters (like many of your uploads) so if an option is available, do you know what box and vicinity of the box i.e. bottom right corner button one or two.????
